name: Asteroids 2.0 (Glitch)
description:
Asteroids is a old game where you are a ship and haves to shoot asteroids

(thats the reason of the name)

i used a tutorial to recreate the game using unity

also you can press esc to close the game

you can see the tutorial here  i recommend it

i also used an image from one of my projects on scratch for the ship(The image is now different)

i am brasillian so i'm sorry if my english is bad
